section.p: This callback is triggered when the remote user calls to resume or stop video capture.

section.title: Trigger Timing
section.p: This callback is triggered when a remote user calls to enable or disable local video capture.

plentry.pd:
Whether the specified remote user enables local video capture:
: Enables the video module. Other users in the channel can see the remote user's video.
: Disables the video module. Other users in the channel cannot receive the remote user's video stream, but the remote user can still receive video streams from others.
